dialogues.name: Teacher
dialogues.content: Hi Vincent! The results are out, how do you feel?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: I feel like I've hit a bottleneck in my studiesâ€¦..

dialogues.name: Teacher
dialogues.content: While there hasn't been any regression, there hasn't been progress either. You still need to strive harder to reach your goal.
